title: Airfrance magazine modern humanist sans
content:
Hello,

Twelve hours flight, without being able to put a name on that typeface.

Headache.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106080717im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_1_5250.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106080717im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_2_4338.jpg)

Yes, the phone pictures are bad, but my sketches are even worse.  
Hope someone here can help.
author: laurent

comments.content:
May be a custom typeface, but 'Negotiate', by Ray Larabie / Typodermic, and 'Adrianna', by Chank Diesel, may get you close.

_(Edit: Too little, too late. ;)_
The crappy-camera effect is actually rather interesting...
